1062.issue: [E1062] js-controller dependency missing. js-controller 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please add to dependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.smappee/blob/master/io-package.json).

1074.issue: [W1074] Potential sensitive data "mqttpassword" not listed at "encryptedNative" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.smappee/blob/master/io-package.json)

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.smappee/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.smappee/blob/master/io-package.json).

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0028.issue: [W0028] Minimum node.js version 20 recommended. Please adapt "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '20' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.smappee/blob/master/package.json).

0034.issue: [W0034] @iobroker/adapter-core 3.2.3 specified. 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.smappee/blob/master/package.json)
